I

inDoDGame - Variable in class ServerClientHandler
Boolean which represents whether the client is in a DoD game or not.
init() - Method in class GameLogic
Initialises the game
initialiseBotResponses() - Method in class ChatBot
Initialises the botResponses HashMap
initialiseReadWrite() - Method in class Client
Initialises the serverIn BufferedReader and the serverOut PrintWriter
initialiseSocketConnection(String, String) - Method in class Client
Initialises the connection to the server in a while loop, so by the end of this method, a connection is established.
initialiseStreams() - Method in class ServerClientHandler
Attempts to initialise clientIn, clientOut and clientType and returns whether the attempt is successful or not.
isHuman() - Method in class BotPlayer
Implementation of the abstract method which is whether the player is human or not, returns false.
isHuman() - Method in class HumanPlayer
Implementation of the abstract method which is whether the player is human or not, returns true.
isHuman() - Method in class Player
Abstract method which will represent whether each player is human or not
